verses.text: Would to \w God|strong="G3785"\w* ye could \w bear|strong="G0430"\w* with \w me|strong="G3450"\w* a \w little|strong="G3397"\w* \w in|strong="G0877"\w* \add my\add* \w folly|strong="G0877"\w*: \w and|strong="G0235"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w bear|strong="G0430"\w* with \w me|strong="G3450"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I am \w jealous|strong="G2206"\w* over \w you|strong="G5209"\w* with \w godly|strong="G2316"\w* \w jealousy|strong="G2205"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I have \w espoused|strong="G0718"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*, that I may \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \add you as\add* a \w chaste|strong="G0053"\w* \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w* to \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w fear|strong="G5399"\w*, lest by any \w means|strong="G3381"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w serpent|strong="G3789"\w* \w beguiled|strong="G1818"\w* \w Eve|strong="G2096"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w subtilty|strong="G3834"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w minds|strong="G3540"\w* should be \w corrupted|strong="G5351"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w* that \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w preacheth|strong="G2784"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2784"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w preached|strong="G2784"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \add if\add* ye \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w have|strong="G1209"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w accepted|strong="G1209"\w*, ye \w might|strong="G0430"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* bear \w with|strong="G0430"\w* \add him\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w suppose|strong="G3049"\w* I \w was|strong="G5302"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* a whit \w behind|strong="G5302"\w* the \w very|strong="G5228"\w* \w chiefest|strong="G3029"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w though|strong="G1487"\w* \add I be\add* \w rude|strong="G2399"\w* in \w speech|strong="G3056"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* we have \w been|strong="G5319"\w* \w throughly|strong="G1722"\w* \w made|strong="G3956"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Have|strong="G2228"\w* I \w committed|strong="G4160"\w* an \w offence|strong="G0266"\w* in \w abasing|strong="G5013"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* might be \w exalted|strong="G5312"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* I have \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w freely|strong="G1432"\w*?

I \w robbed|strong="G4813"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*, \w taking|strong="G2983"\w* \w wages|strong="G3800"\w* \add of them\add*, to \w do|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w service|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when I was \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wanted|strong="G5302"\w*, I was chargeable \w to|strong="G2655"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* that which was \w lacking|strong="G5303"\w* to \w me|strong="G3450"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* which \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w supplied|strong="G4322"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add* I have \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* from being \w burdensome|strong="G0004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add so\add* will I \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \add myself\add*.

\w As|strong="G3754"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, no \w man|strong="G3756"\w* shall \w stop|strong="G4972"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w regions|strong="G2824"\w* of \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*.
\w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w*? \w because|strong="G3754"\w* I \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*? \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* I \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, that I will \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may cut \w off|strong="G1581"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* from \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* they \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*, they may be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \add are\add* false \w apostles|strong="G5570"\w*, \w deceitful|strong="G1386"\w* \w workers|strong="G2040"\w*, transforming \w themselves|strong="G3345"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w marvel|strong="G2298"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* is \w transformed|strong="G3345"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \add it is\add* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* great \w thing|strong="G3173"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ministers|strong="G1249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* be \w transformed|strong="G3345"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w ministers|strong="G1249"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*; \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w Let|strong="G1380"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* a \w fool|strong="G0878"\w*; \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w otherwise|strong="G1161"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2579"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w fool|strong="G0878"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may boast \w myself|strong="G2744"\w* a \w little|strong="G3397"\w*.

That \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \add it\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w foolishly|strong="G0877"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w confidence|strong="G5287"\w* of \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w*.

Seeing \w that|strong="G1893"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w I|strong="G2504"\w* will \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w suffer|strong="G0430"\w* \w fools|strong="G0878"\w* \w gladly|strong="G2234"\w*, seeing \w ye|strong="G5607"\w* \add yourselves\add* are \w wise|strong="G5429"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w suffer|strong="G0430"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w bring|strong="G2615"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* into \w bondage|strong="G2615"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w devour|strong="G2719"\w* \add you\add*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \add of you\add*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* exalt \w himself|strong="G1869"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w smite|strong="G1194"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w*.

I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* as \w concerning|strong="G2596"\w* \w reproach|strong="G0819"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w though|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* had been \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*. \w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* \w whereinsoever|strong="G3739"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* is \w bold|strong="G5111"\w*, (I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w foolishly|strong="G0877"\w*,) \w I|strong="G2504"\w* am \w bold|strong="G5111"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w*.

Are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="G1445"\w*? \w so|strong="G2504"\w* \add am\add* \w I|strong="G2504"\w*. Are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w Israelites|strong="G2475"\w*? \w so|strong="G2504"\w* \add am\add* \w I|strong="G2504"\w*. Are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* the \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*? \w so|strong="G2504"\w* \add am\add* \w I|strong="G2504"\w*.

Are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w ministers|strong="G1249"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*? (\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* as a \w fool|strong="G3912"\w*) \w I|strong="G5228"\w* \add am\add* \w more|strong="G5228"\w*; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w labours|strong="G2873"\w* more \w abundant|strong="G4056"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w stripes|strong="G4127"\w* above \w measure|strong="G5234"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prisons|strong="G5438"\w* more \w frequent|strong="G4056"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w deaths|strong="G2288"\w* \w oft|strong="G4178"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* five \w times|strong="G3999"\w* received \w I|strong="G2983"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add stripes\add* \w save|strong="G3844"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w Thrice|strong="G5151"\w* was I beaten with \w rods|strong="G4463"\w*, \w once|strong="G0530"\w* was I \w stoned|strong="G3034"\w*, \w thrice|strong="G5151"\w* I suffered \w shipwreck|strong="G3489"\w*, a night and a \w day|strong="G3574"\w* I have \w been|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w deep|strong="G1037"\w*;

\add In\add* \w journeyings|strong="G3597"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* of \w waters|strong="G4215"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* of \w robbers|strong="G3027"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \add mine own\add* \w countrymen|strong="G1085"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w heathen|strong="G1484"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2047"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \add in\add* \w perils|strong="G2794"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* false \w brethren|strong="G5569"\w*;

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w weariness|strong="G2873"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w painfulness|strong="G3449"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w watchings|strong="G0070"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w hunger|strong="G3042"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thirst|strong="G1373"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fastings|strong="G3521"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w cold|strong="G5592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nakedness|strong="G1132"\w*.

\w Beside|strong="G5565"\w* those things that are \w without|strong="G3924"\w*, that which \w cometh|strong="G1999"\w* upon \w me|strong="G3450"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w*, the \w care|strong="G3308"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* is \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w am|strong="G0770"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*? \w who|strong="G5101"\w* is \w offended|strong="G4624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w burn|strong="G4448"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* I must \w needs|strong="G1163"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*, I will \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* of the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which concern \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*.

The \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2128"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w evermore|strong="G0165"\w*, \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w lie|strong="G5574"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w* the \w governor|strong="G1481"\w* under \w Aretas|strong="G0702"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w kept|strong="G5432"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of the \w Damascenes|strong="G1153"\w* with a \w garrison|strong="G5432"\w*, \w desirous|strong="G2309"\w* to \w apprehend|strong="G4084"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* a \w window|strong="G2376"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w basket|strong="G4553"\w* was I let \w down|strong="G5465"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w escaped|strong="G1628"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*.
